IFNULL(t3.returned_amount,0.00) AS returned_amount, IFNULL(t4.other_returned_amount,0.00) AS other_returned_amount, IFNULL(t1.ordercount,0) AS order_count, IFNULL(t2.qordercount,0) AS other_order_count, IFNULL(t3.returned_count,0) AS returned_count, IFNULL(t4.other_returned_count,0) AS other_returned_count FROM t_store ts LEFT JOIN t_sys_area a on ts.city_code = a.code and a.level = 2 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tt.store_id, SUM(IFNULL(tt.price,0.00)) AS totalprice, COUNT(tt.group_id) AS ordercount FROM ( SELECT tor.store_id, IFNULL(IF(tor.is_split='yes',tor.trading_price/tog.order_quantity,tor.trading_price),0.0) AS price, tor.group_id AS group_id FROM t_eshop te JOIN t_order tor ON tor.eshop_id=te.id JOIN t_order_group tog ON tog.id=tor.group_id JOIN t_order_receipts trp ON (trp.eshop_id = te.id and trp.`status` =0 and (trp.pay_platform !='prepay' OR tor.business_model_id != '4662527ec28f4a84abfceefa61557d0c')) JOIN t_order_flow tof ON tof.order_id=tor.id AND tof.order_status='signed' AND tof.create_time>=#{begindate} AND tof.create_time<DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) WHERE te.`name` NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND te.white!='QA' ) tt GROUP BY tt.store_id ) t1 ON ts.id=t1.store_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tt.store_id, SUM(IFNULL(tt.price,0.00)) AS qtotalprice, COUNT(tt.group_id) AS qordercount FROM ( SELECT tor.store_id, IFNULL(IF(tor.is_split='yes',tor.trading_price/tog.order_quantity,tor.trading_price),0.0) AS price, tor.group_id AS group_id FROM t_eshop te JOIN t_order tor ON tor.eshop_id=te.id JOIN t_order_group tog ON tog.id=tor.group_id JOIN t_order_receipts trp ON (trp.eshop_id = te.id and trp.`status` =0 and (trp.pay_platform !='prepay' OR tor.business_model_id != '4662527ec28f4a84abfceefa61557d0c')) JOIN t_order_flow tof ON tof.order_id=tor.id AND tof.order_status='signed' AND tof.create_time>=#{begindate} AND tof.create_time<DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) WHERE te.department_id!='00000000000000000000000000000059' AND te.name NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND te.white!='QA' ) tt GROUP BY tt.store_id ) t2 ON ts.id=t2.store_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.store_id, SUM(IFNULL(toref.price,0.00)) AS returned_amount, COUNT(DISTINCT t.group_id) AS returned_count FROM t_order_refund toref JOIN ( SELECT tor.store_id, tor.group_id FROM t_order_returned toret JOIN t_eshop te ON te.id=toret.eshop_id AND te.white!='QA' AND te.name NOT LIKE '%测试%' JOIN t_order tor ON toret.order_id=tor.id WHERE toret.returned_status='done' AND toret.create_time>=#{begindate} AND toret.create_time<DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY tor.group_id ) t ON toref.order_group_id=t.group_id WHERE toref.refund_status='refunded' GROUP BY t.store_id ) t3 ON ts.id=t3.store_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.store_id, SUM(IFNULL(toref.price,0.00)) AS other_returned_amount, COUNT(DISTINCT t.group_id) AS other_returned_count FROM t_order_refund toref JOIN ( SELECT tor.store_id, tor.group_id FROM t_order_returned toret JOIN t_eshop te ON te.id=toret.eshop_id AND te.department_id!='00000000000000000000000000000059' AND te.white!='QA' AND te.name NOT LIKE '%测试%' JOIN t_order tor ON toret.order_id=tor.id WHERE toret.returned_status='done' AND toret.create_time>=#{begindate} AND toret.create_time<DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY tor.group_id ) t ON toref.order_group_id=t.group_id WHERE toref.refund_status='refunded' GROUP BY t.store_id ) t4 ON ts.id=t4.store_id WHERE ts.white!='QA' AND ts.`status`=0 AND ts.number IN (${storeids}) AND ts.`name` NOT LIKE '%测试%'
